workExperience.title: Fullstack Software Engineer
bullets: Delivering robust full-stack solutions using Angular and Java, rigorously testing with Codecept and Jasmine, supporting an application used 600,000 times/month.
Enhanced Auto Insurance quoting app, reducing quote time by 71% and saving $3M+ and 110,400 hours annually.
Integrated real-time behavioral analytics (ForMotiv) to monitor user/agent interactions and detect bad actors.
Key contributor to “Year Make Model BodyStyle” feature, enabling manual vehicle entry and invalid VINs.
Optimized Angular compile/hot reload speed by 130% via environment setup refactor.
Mentored two interns, providing daily structure and guidance.
Redesigned and launched a new shared library, boosting partner collaboration by 40%.
Completed internal course: Docker, Terraform, YAML-based pipelines.

workExperience.title: Server
bullets: Collaborated with kitchen staff to ensure timely order fulfillment (up to 20 hrs/week).
Delivered attentive, personalized service, boosting satisfaction and repeat visits.

workExperience.title: Fullstack Software Engineer Intern
bullets: Developed/tested Angular components with Codecept and Jasmine; integrated with Java backend.
Delivered new features weekly, fixed bugs, and provided production support.

workExperience.title: Fullstack Software Engineer Intern
bullets: Modernized legacy systems with React and Django, enhancing performance and usability.
Built an Excel data integration platform for supply opportunities.

aboutMe.paragraph: I graduated from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute with a B.S. in Computer Science and minors in Management and Media & Culture. My journey has taken me from modernizing legacy systems to launching new features at scale, and I value teamwork, curiosity, and making a difference through technology. Outside of coding, I enjoy playing video games, working out, and watching TV shows/movies.

aboutCards.title: Education
items: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (RPI) — Troy, NY, May 2023
